lead_paragraph: Several fans who traveled to Canton, Ohio, for the Hall of Fame game that was canceled on Sunday night because of poor field conditions are planning to sue the NFL and the hall.

headline.print_headline: Lawsuit Planned by Fans Who Missed Hall of Fame Game
headline.main: Lawsuit Planned by Fans Who Missed Hall of Fame Game
